paper_abstract: Let K be it field and F a finite directed multi-graph. The focus of this paper is to offer a complete description of all path algebras K Gamma and admissible orders with the property that all of their finitely generated ideals have finite Grobner bases and of those which contain a finitely generated ideal whose Grobner bases are all infinite.
